title: Pokémon Adventures: Gold & Silver, Vol. 10
description: A new adventure begins! In order to assist Professor Oak's research, a young Trainer, Crystal, hits the streets of Cherrygrove City with a new Pokédex in hand! Her goal is to catch all kinds of Pokémon! And what will happen when the Legendary Pokémon Suicune has awakened?!
author: Hidenori Kusaka
